column1: Appendix table 20. Numbers and standard errors for figure 11: Nonfatal firearm injuries, 2001–2011

Data source: Consumer Product Safety Commission, National Electronic Injury Surveillance System All Injury Program (NEISS-AIP), 2001–2011, accessed from the National Center for Injury Prevention and Control, CDC.
Authors: Michael Planty and Jennifer Truman
Appendix table 20. Numbers and standard errors for figure 11: Nonfatal firearm injuries, 2001–2011

! Interpret with caution. Estimate based on fewer than 20 NEISS cases (based on unweighted data), national estimates less than 1,200 (based on weighted data), or the coefficient of variation (CV) of the estimate greater than 30%.

Source: Consumer Product Safety Commission, National Electronic Injury Surveillance System All Injury Program (NEISS-AIP), 2001–2011, accessed from the National Center for Injury Prevention and Control, CDC.
